rules: path "auth/token/create/nomad" {  capabilities = ["update"] } path "auth/token/roles/nomad" {  capabilities = ["read"] } path "auth/token/lookup-self" {  capabilities = ["read"] } path "auth/token/lookup" {  capabilities = ["update"] } path "auth/token/revoke-accessor" {  capabilities = ["update"] } path "sys/capabilities-self" {  capabilities = ["update"] } path "auth/token/renew-self" {  capabilities = ["update"] }
